events.title: CBCN 17th Anniversary
events.description: Join us as we celebrate 17 years of God's faithfulness to our church family. Special worship service, fellowship meal, and thanksgiving.

events.title: Love Month Seminar
events.description: A special seminar on building Christ-centered relationships for couples and singles.

events.title: Easter Sunday Service
events.description: Celebrate the resurrection of our Lord Jesus Christ with special music and message.

events.title: Youth Summer Camp
events.description: Annual summer camp for our youth ministry. Three days of fellowship, games, and spiritual growth.

events.title: Vacation Bible School
events.description: A week of fun Bible stories, games, and crafts for children ages 4-12.
